website_summaries.verdict: With a 90 billion culture count, this probiotic won't take long to start working.
pros: Users rave about Renew Life's positive effect on bacterial vaginosis, yeast infection, and vaginal odor
Also works for urinary tract infections
Note that this probiotic requires refrigeration

customer_reviews.title: Stop playing with the knock off 10 million strain probiotics. Be good to your gut!
customer_reviews.text: I believe in probiotics because everything that happens starts from what is happening in your gut. Sluggishness, acne, constipation...... all comes from the gut. I've been taking probiotics for over 10 years and this one blew me away. After 1 week I could totally tell the difference. I AM NOT GETTING PAID nor have I gotten any free product. Yes, I know they are far more expensive than the OTC ones at the local drugstore but its because they actually work. Do yourself a favor and make the investment. Self-care is in this bottle and you will thank me later.
customer_reviews.author: DST Seven

customer_reviews.title: works fantastic and I'm me again!
customer_reviews.text: As a woman who has suffered with constant BV and yeast infections this is a God send. I take it every other day and I'm doing well. No issues and I can finally enjoy sex again.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Dear lord..Ladies. These are amazing. I used them along with boric acid suppositories to cure a yeast infection and bacterial infection. I had them at the same time and my doctor recommended it after antibiotics and diflucan didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: OriHatori

customer_reviews.title: Good things come to those who take probiotics
customer_reviews.text: Recently I learned that ~95% of the serotonin in the body is produced in the gut and therefore having a poor gut microbiome correlates to an increased risk of depression. That estrogen is excreted when we have a bowel movement so irregularity and constipation can lead to hormonal imbalances, acne, and funky cycles for us women. That a gut microbe imbalance can contribute to weight gain, eczema, autoimmune diseases, high blood sugar, and so many other things that I never thought was connected to where stool is formed. More and more research is coming out all the time about this! Seriously, everyone take probiotics!
customer_reviews.author: Brya

customer_reviews.title: Helped high vag ph level and odor!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! Only symptom I had was an unpleasant odor during sex...no itching or discharge, so just thought it was me. Tried this for a week and my vaginal ph has lower to normal level and the odor is gone. Tool my ph from around 6 to a 3.8. I take one daily my mouth and first 4 days I inserted a capsule at bedtime. I am very pleased and feel sexy again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cena Lou

customer_reviews.title: MUST KEEP REFRIGERATED! LIVE CULTURES DIED DURING DELIVERY
customer_reviews.text: After reading the good and bad reviews, but mainly paying attention to the good reviews, I purchased Ultimate FLORA. Thinking it would work for me. Upon arrival the package was warm. Oddly enough the pills worked when it came to my digestive system but not for my BV. Which was the motivator behind me buying these pills. I would only purchase this in a store where it is refrigerated. It is a great product when kept refrigerated.
customer_reviews.author: Erlanda

customer_reviews.title: Know which strength to take.
customer_reviews.text: I swear by this supplement. However, it’s important to know which “strength” your body needs - 25 billion, 50 billion, 90 billion. When I took 25 billion, I felt balanced. I thought that taking 90 billion would make me feel even more balanced - but this wasn’t the case. It disrupted my stomach and made my face break out EXCESSIVELY. As soon as I stopped using it, my face cleared up. Lesson: know which strength will work best for you.
customer_reviews.author: GMR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent probiotic from someone who's on a ton of antibiotics
customer_reviews.text: I'm on a ton of antibiotics for lyme and these are the best probiotics I've ever taken. They keep my gut in tip top shape and I haven't had any of the side effects I expected I would, which I swear is because of these probiotic.
customer_reviews.author: HM

customer_reviews.title: BUYERS BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: *** BUYER BEWARE *** Have been purchasing this for over 1 year loved the way it worked. Last bottle packaging looked a little different but I didn’t think anything of it, until I started having bad stomach issues after taking it. They’ve changed the capsule from “vegetable capsule” to “vegetarian capsule” such a slight change I almost didn’t catch it. All the pictures are still of the old product.

Then bumped up to this strength. . I'm sleeping better, have more energy, more stamina, more physical strength. I'm 51 and am feeling 41!

Ever since I’ve been taking these for almost 2 years I haven’t had one yeast infection or BV again. The reason I’m rating 4 stars is because I noticed after taking these I have stomach gas. Not farting but like trapped gas and I usually have to drink ginger tea daily to soothe my stomach. Other than that issue these are amazing.

Make sure you don’t put anything in your vagina when you wash. Just Wash your outside vagina with fragrance free, dye free, no scent soap, nothing that will throw your PH levels. After your period you can also do a plain yogurt with water douche to balance your PH. Don’t use regular douche! That is not good for you! Hope that helps. Your vagina will smell good 😉

The bottle says to keep it at 71degrees or refrigerate so I’m now wondering why was my item shipped in a regular package in the scalding hot miami sun. I will NEVER buy this item again. Who knows if it will actually work now. Horrible

Tried many different probiotics before learning about this one and none of them made any improvements and some made me constipated, which is the opposite of what they're supposed to do. This one has made a huge difference! I've been taking it almost everyday for a couple of years and noticed a difference right away. I'm able to eat acidic foods that I haven't been able to eat regularly for years and my general gut health is much improved. I've recommended this one to friends who have various digestive issues and all of them have said it's made a difference. Can't recommend it enough.

My throat did not hurt at all and my lymph node was back to normal size, and my UTI completely went away! Such a good alternative to antibiotics, and didn’t have to deal with the nasty yeast infection that follows the use of antibiotics. HIGHLY recommend!

customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a long time. My OB recommended it for vaginal health and it is great to help keep your pH balanced !
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: I love this supplement
customer_reviews.text: I love this supplement. It is part of my daily regimen. Since I take a daily antibiotic, I feel that it is important to balance my system with a probiotic. I feel confident that this product fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: It works, worth the miney
customer_reviews.text: Took these to balance out my ph levels. 100% worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could take these every day
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I just wish I could afford to take them every day. I've recently had surgery and so had issues with digestion from it. These seemed to help. I've had to move on to another brand a bit less expensive but I guess that's why it's a good quality.
customer_reviews.author: zephyr

customer_reviews.title: DOES THE JOB!!!
customer_reviews.text: Good probiotic...have tried many but these seem to do the trick with assisting my digestive system
customer_reviews.author: Iriemango

customer_reviews.title: My wife really liked these, and though I don't think she could ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife really liked these, and though I don't think she could tell a substantial difference in how she felt, she keeps making me re-buy them, so I guess that's 5 stars?
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jenkinson

customer_reviews.title: ... infection but I found a brand that did much better (Jarrow's women 10 billion)
customer_reviews.text: I thought this helped me for a time with an infection but I found a brand that did much better (Jarrow's women 10 billion). Everyone is different, of course.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Probiotic
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite probiotic. I was told to start taking one for infections that I keep getting and it has made a huge difference!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Campos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This item has helped me against recurrent urinary tract infections!
customer_reviews.author: Maria S Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Swear by this product
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended I take a probiotic, did some research and decided to try these. Really have helped with digestive issues and in my opinion I feel like I don't get colds as often or as severe. I've recommended them to several people.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Just get them.
customer_reviews.text: The best probiotics I’ve taken. My iron supplement no longer backs things up. It is very obvious that my body is responding to these in positive ways. I has put on very strong antibiotics right after birth for an incision infection (thanks to a staple that wasn’t removed), and these got everything back to normal for the health of myself and my baby girl.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Sbragia

customer_reviews.title: Worth a second try for me!
customer_reviews.text: My sister recommended this-I can’t find this potency in a retail store. Arrived when and as expected. I plan to order another month because I didn’t use it consistently enough to determine if it was productive for me or not.
customer_reviews.author: Denise M Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Product wasn't good for me
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't take this product anymore, it binded up my digestive system and I was experiencing constipation. I'm going to buy one that has a lower amount of active organisms. Instead of 90 Billion, maybe I would benefit from 50 Billion. Everybody is different.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am on my 4th bottle of this probiotic and I love it. Best probiotic I have ever bought and I've been taking probiotics for the past 6 years.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Pate

customer_reviews.title: Awesome company and product
customer_reviews.text: Works great and seems to be helping my bloating along with a better diet. Called customer service a few times with questions about proper dosing with my condition and they helped me greatly. Will only purchase this product from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya B.

customer_reviews.title: No more yeast infections
customer_reviews.text: I usually get monthly yeast from wacky hormones and these probiotics keep them at bay.
customer_reviews.author: monica grant

customer_reviews.title: The jury's out...
customer_reviews.text: After a process of elimination, it appears that the product was contributing to constipation. After discontinuing the product, the constipation relented. I may resume it later to see what happens...
customer_reviews.author: Abs1213

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I’ve been going through constipation for months and now I’m going every morning. Will be sticking to this.
customer_reviews.author: Kyziah McCall

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: I tried various probiotics for my BV and none of them worked. I originally bought 50 CFU and took them every single day to no avail and still got excess discharge. I decided to just get the 90 hoping that it will help and miraculously it worked! I don’t have to take it everyday, only a couple of days after my period. I would recommend to just get this alongside boric acid suppositories.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it and I do believe that it helps me
customer_reviews.text: I have had stomach problems for years and I saw on PBS a show about this brand. I have used Ultimate Flora for the last few years now. I love it and I do believe that it helps me.
customer_reviews.author: Teagirl49

customer_reviews.title: I should  of started  these  a long  time  ago.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't taken them that long. But I can feel the difference after taken them. I feel that my energy has boost a lot my stomach feels so much better.
customer_reviews.author: La Sharn

customer_reviews.title: Take Renew Life Women’s Probiotic with assured confidence!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love this product. I feel confident my gut is being protected and replenished with good flora daily. While I seem to be surrounded by people with the flu, I haven’t even had so much as a sore throat. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Fay Wallage

customer_reviews.title: Hasn't done much for me.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for over a month now and it hasn't performed any of the miracles that so many reviews have boasted about. I had chosen to get them mailed to me monthly, to be surprised that this second month that I got them the price when up $10. For the price, I wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: The only product I have on a subscription basis. I can't find these in stores. They work so well and I highly recommend them. Much better than the other probiotics that I was taking.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Lilli

customer_reviews.title: One of the best probiotics out there
customer_reviews.text: One of the best probiotics out there....and I've tried many. Also, much cheaper to purchase it on Amazon than it is directly from Renew Life's website.
customer_reviews.author: skydive99

customer_reviews.title: Good value, upset stomach
customer_reviews.text: Sadly these were not the best for me. They made my stomach upset and I ended up having a lot of tummy trouble in the 30 days of trying them. Decided not to continue on them. Will go back to the brand I used previously.
customer_reviews.author: JSShop

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep my gut in check, especially since I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: Helps keep my gut in check, especially since I'm on round the clock antibiotics for a skin issue. Always comes on time but prices keep rising. May need to order less potent soon if the price keeps going north.
customer_reviews.author: DelKris

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to take and it works
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this pill a month ago, because I learned I might have constipation. Which is why I was not losing any weight. With my exercise 3 to 5 days a week, and the pill the weight is coming off. And I plan on continuing with them.
customer_reviews.author: Rema Touchins

customer_reviews.title: Not the best.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I should've been more consistent, but I didn't see much of a difference when taking these pills. Not easy to swallow. Found a better probiotic afterwards. Hyperbiotics.
customer_reviews.author: Naty Y

product_meta.title: Renew Life Womens Probiotic - Ultimate Flora Women's Care, Shelf Stable Probiotic Supplement - Gluten, Dairy & Soy Free - 90 Billion CFU -30 Vegetarian Capsules - Pack of 1
product_meta.description: Size:30 Count (Pack of 1)| Style:Women'sRenew Life, the makers of the number 1 selling women’s probiotic, invites you to feel lighter, brighter and more energized with Women's Care Probiotic 90 billion. It has 12 specially selected strains designed to re-establish digestive balance and support immune health. We also use a potent Lactobacilli formula to help support vaginal health, so you can get back to doing what you love. Quality, purity and potency guaranteed through expiration. DISCLAIMERS: These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Based on unit sales of Renew Life Women’s Care Probiotic 25 Billion.
feature_bullets: FROM THE MAKERS OF THE NUMBER 1 SELLING WOMEN'S PROBIOTIC: Renew Life knows women, and that’s why we formulated a potent Ultimate Flora Women’s Care Probiotic to re-establish digestive balance.

HIGH-QUALITY GUARANTEE: Renew Life is rated the number 1 probiotic brand in consumer satisfaction for 2018, guaranteeing quality, purity and potency through expiration. Made in the USA using only the highest quality global ingredients

DIGESTIVE HEALTH: With 90 billion cultures and 12 specially selected strains to reflect the natural diversity of your gut, this women’s probiotic helps restore digestive harmony and is gluten free, dairy free and soy free

IMMUNE AND VAGINAL PROBIOTIC: Did you know your gut is home to 70% of your immune system. Women’s Care probiotic for women supports both digestive and immune health, plus the potent Lactobacillus formula helps support vaginal health
SHELF STABLE PROBIOTIC: For this probiotic supplement for women, refrigeration is recommended, but not required, so stick it in the fridge only if you want to

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
